About.title: About Us
About.subtitle: Your trusted travel partner since 2020
About.heroSubtitle: TIMEOUT Travel Agency connects you with the world's finest hotels and creates memorable experiences that last a lifetime
About.ourStoryText: TIMEOUT Travel Agency was founded with a simple mission: to make luxury travel accessible to everyone. We believe that every journey should be an unforgettable experience, filled with comfort, elegance, and exceptional service.
About.ourMissionText: To provide seamless booking experiences and curated accommodations that exceed expectations. We partner with the finest hotels worldwide to bring you exclusive deals and personalized service.
About.valuesSubtitle: Our core values guide everything we do, from selecting partner hotels to serving our customers
About.value1Text: We strive for excellence in everything we do, from customer service to property selection.
About.value2Text: Building lasting relationships with our customers through transparency and reliability.
About.value3Text: Continuously improving our platform to provide the best booking experience.
About.value4Text: We are passionate about travel and dedicated to making your dreams come true.
About.teamSubtitle: Dedicated professionals committed to making your travel dreams a reality

2020.title: The Beginning
2020.description: TIMEOUT was founded with a vision to revolutionize the travel industry

2023.description: Awarded Best Travel Platform and reached 30,000+ customers

2024.description: Launched premium services and expanded to 500+ hotels worldwide

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find quick answers to common questions

1.question: How do I make a reservation?
1.answer: You can make a reservation by browsing our hotels and rooms, selecting your preferred accommodation, and following the booking process. You will need to provide your details and payment information.

2.question: What is your cancellation policy?
2.answer: Our cancellation policy varies depending on the hotel and room type. Generally, free cancellation is available up to 24-48 hours before check-in. Please check the specific terms when booking.

3.question: Do you offer group bookings?
3.answer: Yes, we offer special rates and services for group bookings. Please contact our team directly for group reservations of 5 or more rooms.

4.question: How can I modify my booking?
4.answer: You can modify your booking by logging into your account and accessing your reservations, or by contacting our customer support team directly.

5.question: What payment methods do you accept?
5.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and bank transfers for larger bookings.

testimonials.title: What Our Guests Say
testimonials.subtitle: We are proud to have created so many unforgettable memories for our guests.
testimonials.testimonial1: The most incredible hotel I have ever stayed in. The service was impeccable and the views were breathtaking. I can't wait to come back!
testimonials.testimonial2: A truly magical experience. The attention to detail was amazing. The staff went above and beyond to make our stay special. Highly recommended!
testimonials.testimonial3: From the moment we arrived, we were treated like royalty. The room was spacious and luxurious, and the food was divine. A perfect getaway.

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.section1Text: We collect information that you provide to us directly, such as when you create an account, book a room, or contact us for support. This may include your name, email address, phone number, and payment information.
PrivacyPolicy.section2Text: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, to process your bookings, and to communicate with you. We may also use your information to send you promotional offers and updates about our services.
PrivacyPolicy.section3Text: We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information with our trusted partners, such as hotels and payment processors, to facilitate your bookings and provide you with a seamless experience.

Blog.title: Our Blog
Blog.welcomeMessage: Welcome to our blog! Stay tuned for the latest news, travel tips, and exclusive offers.

Help.title: Help Center
Help.subtitle: Find answers to your questions and get the help you need.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.noResults: No results found for your search.

item1.question: How do I book a room?
item1.answer: You can book a room by navigating to the 'Rooms' or 'Hotels' page, selecting your desired accommodation, and following the on-screen instructions to complete the booking process.

item2.question: What is the cancellation policy?
item2.answer: The cancellation policy varies by hotel and room type. You can find the specific cancellation policy for your booking during the reservation process and in your confirmation email.

item3.question: How can I contact customer support?
item3.answer: You can contact our customer support team 24/7 via email at support@timeout.com, or by visiting our 'Contact' page for more options.

item4.question: How to change the theme?
item4.answer: You can change the theme of the site from dark to light, for this there is a switch in the header of the site.

item5.question: How do I view my booking details?
item5.answer: You can view your booking details by logging into your account and navigating to the 'My Bookings' section. There you will find all your past and upcoming reservations.

item6.question: How can I update my profile information?
item6.answer: To update your profile information, log into your account and go to the 'Profile' section. You can edit your name, contact details, and other personal information there.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started Guide
gettingStarted.p1: Welcome to TIMEOUT! To get started, you can browse our selection of hotels and rooms using the navigation bar. Use the search and filter options to find the perfect accommodation for your needs.
gettingStarted.p2: Once you've found a place you like, simply click 'Book Now' and follow the steps to complete your reservation. You'll need to create an account to manage your bookings.

bookingManagement.title: Managing Your Bookings
bookingManagement.p1: All your bookings are available in the 'My Bookings' section of your account. Here you can view details of your upcoming and past stays, check payment status, and, if applicable, modify or cancel your reservation.
bookingManagement.p2: Please note that any changes to your booking are subject to the hotel's policy. Make sure to review the terms before making any changes.

accountSettings.title: Your Account Settings
accountSettings.p1: In the 'Profile' section, you can manage your personal information, including your name, email, and phone number. It is important to keep this information up to date for booking confirmations and communication.
accountSettings.p2: You can also manage your notification preferences and view your review history. For security, you can change your password at any time.

contact.title: Still Need Help?
contact.description: If you can't find the answer you're looking for, our support team is always here to assist you. Don't hesitate to reach out.

guidelines.title: Our Guidelines
guidelines.description: Please review our terms of service and privacy policy for detailed information about our platform.
